review: Once I determined that I need a splitter to use the Fire Stick with my TV I now can easily switch between cable, blu-ray, and Fire Stick. It's a lot easier to access all the streaming options so I'll take more advantage of them. It was easy to set up and it was operating in a few minutes. I am very happy with the Fire Stick.
